Articles.Content:
Spontaneous combustion of both Jeb and now Bill while trying out the Formula K challenge. This has happened a few times now in other circumstances, once just walking in EVA. This time I isolated the mods I am using and it might be Deadly Re-entry. This is with the DRE 6.3.1 beta version, but it has happened with DRE 6.2.1. After some time and it is random if it occurs, they just start cooking. Hot stuff!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Mods in use are Toolbar, ATM, DRE, KER, HullCam, RSCFX, NG, PT, StockBugFix

Edited December 1, 2014 by MoeslyArmlis
DRE 6.3.2

Initially I thought it was with the save file or was occuring randomly. But going from a capsule to a command seat is the trigger.

After further testing and reducing to stock with only DRE 6.3.1, this can be easily repeatable.

When experiments go too, too far.

Experimental dance: Disco Inferno

Fall intern dance party was hot, hot, hot.

Starwaster has been notified so enjoy this bug while you can.
